Package de.lmu.dbs.jfeaturelib.utils

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Distance  
    GradientSource
    Defines a class from which image gradients can be obtained.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DerivativeImage
    Calculates the standard derivatives Dx and Dy of an image using a -1,0,1 kernel and stores the results in separate ImageProcessors.
    DistanceL2
    Euclidean distance (L2) d = Math.sqrt(x^2 + y^2)
    Extractor
    Class used as a commandline tool to extract features from directories of images.
    GeometricBlur
    Gaussian Blur where sigma is modified according to spacial position to the "query point".
    GradientImage
    Class that calculates gradients from a given image.
    Histogram
    A histogram class for counting occurences of values.
    Interpolated1DHistogram
    The Interpolated1DHistogram class is used to create interpolates histograms for a certain range of values ([min,max[) with a defined range of bins.
    RGBtoGray
    Simple util to convert RGB values to gray values
